sentences.en: Are you most abhor of northerner?
sentences.cn: 你不是最痛恨北方人的 吗 ?

sentences.en: He might pass as a northerner in Westminster, but he would be a southerner in Leeds.
sentences.cn: 尽管他在议会里还能冒充北方人, 但到了利兹就是个南方人了.

sentences.en: His accent gave him away as a northerner.
sentences.cn: 他的口音让人听出他是北方人.

sentences.en: I am a northerner to Nanning has been for 12 years.
sentences.cn: 我是北方人,来南宁已经有12年了.

sentences.en: I am not northerner, I thought that I will finish my professional profession in here.
sentences.cn: 我不是北方人, 我想我会在这里结束我的职业生涯.

sentences.en: I like the openness and directness of northerners.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢北方人的豪爽和直率。

sentences.en: Judging by his accent, he must be a northerner.
sentences.cn: 从口音听得出来, 他一定是北方人.

sentences.en: Judging from his accent, he must be a northerner.
sentences.cn: 从他的口音判断, 他一定是个北方人.

sentences.en: Mr Akayev , the strongman, was a northerner.
sentences.cn: 强人阿卡耶夫是北方人.

sentences.en: Northerner as he was, Wang Ho - fu combined a humorous disposition with a great tenacity of purpose.
sentences.cn: 他有北方人一般的诙谐气质, 又有北方人一般的肯死心去干的气质.

sentences.en: Since it is a northerner, I recommend you bring the right seafood, dried fruits is required.
sentences.cn: 既然是北方人, 我推荐你可以带些海产品合适, 干果也行.

sentences.en: Third, if you are a northerner, and perhaps did not really understand Fuzhou cavity.
sentences.cn: 第三, 如果你是北方人, 也许听不太懂福州腔.

sentences.en: You can't mistake him: he's a northerner and he always shouts. "
sentences.cn: 这位是北方人,嗓子很响,你大概不会弄错的. ”

words.tran_cn: 在东北的；东北方的；来自东北的
北方的，向北的；来自北方的
来自西北的；西北方的；在西北部的

trans.tran_en: A northerner is a person who was born in or who lives in the north of a place or country
